title: Dispel Undead
data:
***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

| [![Dispel undead.png](/images/5/5f/Dispel_undead.png)](/File:Dispel_undead.png) Dispel Undead |                                                                                                          |
| :-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Level                                                                                         | 4                                                                                                        |
| School1                                                                                       | [Necromancy](/Necromancy "Necromancy")                                                                   |
| Source(s)                                                                                     | [Book of Decay](/Book_of_Decay "Book of Decay") [Book of Touch](/Book_of_Touch "Book of Touch")          |
| [Casting noise](/Spell_noise "Spell noise")                                                   | 4                                                                                                        |
| [Spell noise](/Spell_noise "Spell noise")                                                     | 0                                                                                                        |
| Power Cap                                                                                     | 100                                                                                                      |
| Range                                                                                         | 1                                                                                                        |
| Hated By                                                                                      | [Elyvilon](/Elyvilon "Elyvilon") [The Shining One](/The_Shining_One "The Shining One") [Zin](/Zin "Zin") |
| Flags                                                                                         | Dir or target, Needs tracer                                                                              |

|   |                                                                                               |
| - | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | Harms an adjacent undead creature greatly by interfering with the forces binding it together. |

| Spell Details                           |                        |
| :-------------------------------------- | ---------------------- |
| Damage Formula                          | 3d(6.66+Power/4)       |
| Max Damage                              | 3d(31.66)              |
| [Max Power](/Spell_power "Spell power") | 100                    |
| Range                                   | 1                      |
| Targeting                               | Touch                  |
| To-hit                                  | Never misses           |
| Special                                 | Ignores [AC](/AC "AC") |

**Dispel Undead** is a level 4 [Necromancy](/Necromancy "Necromancy") spell which deals [AC](/AC "AC")-ignoring, unavoidable damage to a single [undead](/Undead "Undead") target.

## Contents

- [1 Strategy](#Strategy)
  - [1.1 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [2 Monster Version](#Monster_Version)
- [3 History](#History)

## Strategy

Although it only affects a select few opponents, and only at melee range, Dispel Undead is nice to have against them. Good targets in the late-game include [liches](/Lich "Lich"), [curse skulls](/Curse_skull "Curse skull") and [curse toes](/Curse_toe "Curse toe"), as well as [death cobs](/Death_cob "Death cob"). If found early enough, [Necromancers](/Necromancer "Necromancer") can use it to take out [wights](/Wight "Wight") and other early-D enemies.

### Tips & Tricks

- Dispel Undead is very effective against [player ghosts](/Player_ghost "Player ghost"); player ghosts often have tremendous AC/EV, and Dispel Undead ignores all defenses.
- Keep in mind that it only affects undead, not [demons](/Demon "Demon"). Necromancers will need another way to kill foes immune to negative energy.

## Monster Version

The following enemies cast Dispel Undead:

- p [![Burial acolyte.png](/images/8/8d/Burial_acolyte.png)](/File:Burial_acolyte.png) **[Burial acolyte](/Burial_acolyte "Burial acolyte")** (3d7 damage)

Player ghosts can cast this spell if they knew it in life.

Several monsters have access to a ranged version of this spell, [Dispel Undead Range](/Dispel_Undead_Range "Dispel Undead Range").

## History

- Prior to [0.25](/0.25 "0.25"), Dispel Undead was a level 5 spell with range 5.
- Prior to [0.10](/0.10 "0.10"), Dispel Undead was a level 4 spell.
html:
Dispel Undead

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
 Dispel Undead
Level 4
School1 Necromancy
Source(s) Book of Decay
Book of Touch
Casting noise 4
Spell noise 0
Power Cap 100
Range 1
Hated By Elyvilon
The Shining One
Zin
Flags Dir or target, Needs tracer
Harms an adjacent undead creature greatly by interfering with the forces binding it together.
Spell Details
Damage Formula 3d(6.66+Power/4)
Max Damage 3d(31.66)
Max Power 100
Range 1
Targeting Touch
To-hit Never misses
Special Ignores AC

Dispel Undead is a level 4 Necromancy spell which deals AC-ignoring, unavoidable damage to a single undead target.

Contents

  • 1 Strategy
    • 1.1 Tips & Tricks
  • 2 Monster Version
  • 3 History

Strategy

Although it only affects a select few opponents, and only at melee range, Dispel Undead is nice to have against them. Good targets in the late-game include liches, curse skulls and curse toes, as well as death cobs. If found early enough, Necromancers can use it to take out wights and other early-D enemies.

Tips & Tricks

  • Dispel Undead is very effective against player ghosts; player ghosts often have tremendous AC/EV, and Dispel Undead ignores all defenses.
  • Keep in mind that it only affects undead, not demons. Necromancers will need another way to kill foes immune to negative energy.

Monster Version

The following enemies cast Dispel Undead:

  • p Burial acolyte (3d7 damage)

Player ghosts can cast this spell if they knew it in life.

Several monsters have access to a ranged version of this spell, Dispel Undead Range.

History

  • Prior to 0.25, Dispel Undead was a level 5 spell with range 5.
  • Prior to 0.10, Dispel Undead was a level 4 spell.

'''Dispel Undead''' is a level 4 [[Necromancy]] spell which deals [[AC]]-ignoring, unavoidable damage to a single [[undead]] target. 

==Strategy==
Although it only affects a select few opponents, and only at melee range, Dispel Undead is nice to have against them. Good targets in the late-game include [[lich]]es, [[curse skull]]s and [[curse toe]]s, as well as [[death cob]]s. If found early enough, [[Necromancer]]s can use it to take out [[wight]]s and other early-D enemies.

===Tips & Tricks===
*Dispel Undead is very effective against [[player ghost]]s; player ghosts often have tremendous AC/EV, and Dispel Undead ignores all defenses.
*Keep in mind that it only affects undead, not [[demon]]s. Necromancers will need another way to kill foes immune to negative energy.

==Monster Version==
{{monsters with spell}}
Player ghosts can cast this spell if they knew it in life.

Several monsters have access to a ranged version of this spell, [[Dispel Undead Range]].

==History==
*Prior to [[0.25]], Dispel Undead was a level 5 spell with range 5.
*Prior to [[0.10]], Dispel Undead was a level 4 spell.
